query:
-- 1. Deletar associações clientes-mercados
DELETE FROM clientes_mercados;

-- 2. Deletar leads
DELETE FROM leads WHERE projectId = 1;

-- 3. Deletar concorrentes
DELETE FROM concorrentes WHERE projectId = 1;

-- 4. Deletar produtos
DELETE FROM produtos WHERE projectId = 1;

-- 5. Deletar mercados
DELETE FROM mercados_unicos WHERE projectId = 1;

-- 6. Resetar status de validação dos clientes (manter dados originais)
UPDATE clientes 
SET 
  validationStatus = NULL,
  validatedAt = NULL,
  validatedBy = NULL
WHERE projectId = 1;

-- Verificar resultado
SELECT 
  'APÓS LIMPEZA' as status,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clientes WHERE projectId = 1) as clientes_total,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clientes WHERE projectId = 1 AND validationStatus IS NOT NULL) as clientes_enriquecidos,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mercados_unicos WHERE projectId = 1) as mercados,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM produtos WHERE projectId = 1) as produtos,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM concorrentes WHERE projectId = 1) as concorrentes,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM leads WHERE projectId = 1) as leads,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clientes_mercados) as associacoes;

DELETE FROM clientes_mercados;

-- 2. Deletar leads
DELETE FROM leads WHERE projectId = 1;

-- 3. Deletar concorrentes
DELETE FROM concorrentes WHERE projectId = 1;

-- 4. Deletar produtos
DELETE FROM produtos WHERE projectId = 1;

-- 5. Deletar mercados
DELETE FROM mercados_unicos WHERE projectId = 1;

-- 6. Resetar status de validação dos clientes (manter dados originais)
UPDATE clientes 
SET 
  validationStatus = NULL,
  validatedAt = NULL,
  validatedBy = NULL
WHERE projectId = 1;

-- Verificar resultado
SELECT 
  'APÓS LIMPEZA' as status,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clientes WHERE projectId = 1) as clientes_total,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clientes WHERE projectId = 1 AND validationStatus IS NOT NULL) as clientes_enriquecidos,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mercados_unicos WHERE projectId = 1) as mercados,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM produtos WHERE projectId = 1) as produtos,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM concorrentes WHERE projectId = 1) as concorrentes,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM leads WHERE projectId = 1) as leads,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clientes_mercados) as associacoes;
